name: Moto Crazy -Impossible Trial
description:
Moto Crazy -Impossible Trial is the No.1 xtreme BMX game with insane and stunt action.Increase your motorbike's speed, breaking level and add extra lives. these will all have a definite impact on your bike's performance. This game is a fun, addictive motorbike stunts game set on a highest derivable altitude.
Feature:
Realistic interface and rider animation
Tricky tracks and pathways
A game of nonstop amusement and thrill
Good sound effects and interface
Multi camera angles mode
